TextLibrary.Text: Selentius! You've kidnapped your own daughter!
Selentius! You've kidnapped your own daughter!
Selentius! You've kidnapped your own daughter!
Selentius! You've kidnapped your own daughter!
She is my daughter, I can do with her as I will. As far as I am concerned it is YOU who kidnapped her on the way to her wedding.
She is my daughter, I can do with her as I will. As far as I am concerned it is YOU who kidnapped her on the way to her wedding.
She is my daughter, I can do with her as I will. As far as I am concerned it is YOU who kidnapped her on the way to her wedding.
She is my daughter, I can do with her as I will. As far as I am concerned it is YOU who kidnapped her on the way to her wedding.
Serephine didn't need my help to run away, and you know it.
Serephine didn't need my help to run away, and you know it.
Serephine didn't need my help to run away, and you know it.
Serephine didn't need my help to run away, and you know it.

My dear boy, Serephine is the property of the Empire, and the Empire belongs to ME. She is no more than a commodity I was trading to those distasteful barbarians in the south. You stole her from me, and the penalty for stealing from me is death. Prepare yourself!

My dear boy, Serephine is the property of the Empire, and the Empire belongs to ME. She is no more than a commodity I was trading to those distasteful barbarians in the south. You stole her from me, and the penalty for stealing from me is death. Prepare yourself!

My dear girl, Serephine is the property of the Empire, and the Empire belongs to ME. She is no more than a commodity I was trading to those distasteful barbarians in the south. You stole her from me, and the penalty for stealing from me is death. Prepare yourself!

My dear girl, Serephine is the property of the Empire, and the Empire belongs to ME. She is no more than a commodity I was trading to those distasteful barbarians in the south. You stole her from me, and the penalty for stealing from me is death. Prepare yourself!
